website_summaries.verdict: Convenient yarn storage that fits well in tight spaces.
pros: Comes with snap-on attachments to store needles, crochet hooks, and extra yarn
Open top provides quick and easy access to yarn
Caddy folds flat for easy storage when empty
Fits conveniently under most side and coffee tables
cons: Caddy is not ideal for traveling with

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and holds a lot! I’ve just recently gotten in to knitting and kind of got myself addicted to bernat yarn, which is very bulky! But it holds all the skeins, and the pockets on the outside are very convienient! I like that you had the option to have the pockets on the inside or the outside. Very helpful! Would 100% recommend! *note: I would not use this as a traveling caddy, but one to hold supplies at home out of the way. Does not come with carrying handles.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Has a few screws loose. Literally.
customer_reviews.text: The screws holding the basket together began falling out almost immediately, and I certainly have not been subjecting it to anything other than normal use inside the house. It's impossible to keep them in for long before they slide out again. . I don't know if I happened to get a defective item, or if they're all this badly made, but I will never buy anything from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Mundi

customer_reviews.title: So very handy!
customer_reviews.text: What was I thinking waiting so long to purchase this caddy?! So handy - no more searching for needles, no more hunting for the next ball of yarn that has most likely been smuggled to the dog bed. Wish it were a little larger, but I also wish I had a pony. It's still great.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader320

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT EMBROIDERY PROJECT BAG
customer_reviews.text: I’m embroidering a set of each day of the week kitchen towels with vintage designs and wanted a place to store them that would have an attractive print yet not be overwhelming. I Searched on a resale site for vintage bags but they ended up being $$$ than this new one. The vintage ones also had dated prints and colors. The storage bag complements the colors in our den. I placed this storage bag in front of a side table where it stands discreetly. I’ve gotten several compliments on it too. A great find: good price, size and practical.
customer_reviews.author: LitChick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for knitters or seamstress!
customer_reviews.text: This knitting holder is awesome. I have every size needle and they all fit in the pockets. The top row I put the bigger needles. I put one pair in the pockets. On the bottom row I put two sets of needles. They fit perfectly. On the other side there is three zipper pockets. I put various things in each. On the inside I have several skeins of yarn, plus what I am working on sits right on top. Perfect! Would make a lovely gift for knitters or seamstress. I'm going to get another one for my to go sewing kit.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Womack

customer_reviews.title: Convenient storage and easy to take with me.
customer_reviews.text: Great way to store my current knitting project. Keeps everything in one place and it's easy to take it with me to "knit night" with the girls. No more yarn balls rolling on the floor! Very happy with the quality. Looks nice and made well. Will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy Helper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend’s birthday and she loved it! She was crocheting blankets for her future grandson and this holds her yarn. There’s a pocket to hold the needles too! It well made and a good size. You could really use this for anything really. I was very happy to find this one as they’re hard to find in the store anymore. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: MJ Chappy

customer_reviews.title: This is great for keeping my current loom knitting project next to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great for keeping my current loom knitting project next to my favorite chair. I also use the pockets to store all my spare knitting tools. Its a good canvas material, with a solid frame. I only wish there were more colors available!
customer_reviews.author: Ma MaGoo

customer_reviews.title: My Wife Loves This!
customer_reviews.text: My wife recently took up knitting and had a difficult time keeping everything, i.e. yarn, scissors, needles together. Per my wife, everything fits wonderfully well and it has made starting and stopping knitting a breeze. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L

customer_reviews.title: I like having the compartment flaps for storing needles and such
customer_reviews.text: I like having the compartment flaps for storing needles and such. The bag is a good height and width for projects but it is a bit narrow for larger work such as afghans and men's sweaters. I bought to store a cable knit afghan I'm working on. I was disappointed only because it arrived missing one tube cover on the handle. I worry I may scratch the furnisher I park my work against. Still, it looks sturdy and well worth the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Cila Merriam

customer_reviews.title: Knitting Need!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my fiance because she is a HUGE knitter. I noticed that she would carry a lot of bags around with projects that shes currently working on. So I got her this. She LOVES it. Uses it everyday and can handle many knitting projects. She can even carry it room to room very easily and not have to carry so many bags around. Very nice caddy!
customer_reviews.author: J. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this caddy. Lightweight and has tons of room. Love the organizers on the side. Very useful. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and well organized
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect next to my chair. It stands open so the yarn comes out of it smoothly, and the needle holder is GREAT! Easy to pick up and move out of the way when necessary. It's terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Functional
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a birthday gift and I love it. Great way to help me keep all my crocheting stuff organized. Especially love the hook pockets. The crochet hooks can stand upright in them so no more fishing for the correct hook.
customer_reviews.author: Jill D.

customer_reviews.title: Missing leg cap
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Art Bin containers for years, everything from ‘bin’ for my pastels and art brushes to storage of silver jewelry findings, so I was very disappointed when my new Art Bin Knitting Caddy arrived with a cap for one of its legs missing. I tried to returned it, but UPS store didn’t have Wi-Fi and I decided my time Was more valuable than running around trying to return item. Otherwise Caddy is useful and in use.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia C. Scully

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is foldable if I have nothing to work on. I love the print, is not loud & annoying but very classy. It's very durable & holds plenty. I'm thinking about getting one for my Mom & one for my Grandma too.
customer_reviews.author: Mystie Graves

customer_reviews.title: Great knitting bag
customer_reviews.text: My Mom loved this knitting bag. It is sturdy, durable and just the right size for her yarn.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Mulcahy

customer_reviews.title: Great for crafting supplies
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Mother’s Day. It’s wonderful!! Sits beside my chair and now I can keep all my crafting supplies/projects in one place. It’s sturdy and nice quality. Has some smaller pockets for needles and smaller supplies. Makes a wonderful gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Tamra

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Just as said and more so glad I got it .
customer_reviews.author: annie thomas

customer_reviews.title: This was exactly what my yarn needed
customer_reviews.text: The pockets on the side are great for organizing my different size crochet hooks. The middle section holds several skeins of yarn
customer_reviews.author: TKurjiaka

customer_reviews.title: Knitting Bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It has places for everything you need, whether it is knitting, crochet, or quilting! It is sturdy and also folds up with your project inside keeping it clean and out of the way until you are ready to work on it again..
customer_reviews.author: Gayla Waller

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for the eternal artist
customer_reviews.text: Much larger storage when you use all the pockets. This stores everything from my from my crochet to coloring books
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love the whole setup! It is very wonderful for me in my needs. But the pockets are not very good they tear very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Large Knitting Holder
customer_reviews.text: I love this caddy, although it's larger than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Dorette Preston

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: The caddy looks like the picture in real life, but it is bigger than it seems in the picture. My mom liked it a lot, so I guess it works well for knitting.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: SHE LOVES IT and its so durable and sturdy! This is an AMAZING buy and WOULD DEF ...
customer_reviews.text: A+++++++++++ if you know someone that loves to knit, this organizer just completely moved and shocked my mom! SHE LOVES IT and its so durable and sturdy! This is an AMAZING buy and WOULD DEF buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Lesliefritz16

customer_reviews.title: Looks Really Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The poly canvas is just heavy duty plastic. It makes the product look very cheap. Since I intended to keep this in my family room, I can't use it. Just doesn't look good. it's a great concept and I would have loved it - had it looked nicer.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, plenty of storage
customer_reviews.text: It is really just sitting at the end of my sofa. Seems sturdy. Have not pushed it, with weight. Love the extra pockets for hooks and needles. I am ginjng it 3 stars for now. When it is fully loaded, I will either decrease or add the stars. So far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: lynn weaver

customer_reviews.title: Well-Designed!
customer_reviews.text: My preteen daughter keeps her knitting supplies very well-organized in this! She even asked for an extra one for the Holidays.
customer_reviews.author: 10 Soon!

customer_reviews.title: Handy for changing yarn colors
customer_reviews.text: 3 of the rubbers for legs were gone but still usable, love it
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Casarez

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This yarn caddy is well made and a good size. I have a lot of yarn and it holds plenty for my projects. It looks nice and I like the additional pockets for needles, etc. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Paxton

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and sturdy. Holds yarn and needles comfortably and easily. Folds up easily when not in uses love it
customer_reviews.author: CHMil

customer_reviews.title: For a knitter this is perfect! Came well packaged
customer_reviews.text: For a knitter this is perfect! Came well packaged, and arrived when it said it would.Thank you so much for a great product that is affordable and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Cathie C.

customer_reviews.title: Materials kept neatly
customer_reviews.text: This was bought to store crochet materials in. Keeps them from being in unsightly plastic shopping bags. Hoorah!
customer_reviews.author: Dixie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great yarn basket
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT! I May get another one though,I have a lot of projects going (really too many!) so I need more space..it'd be great larger!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fatal design flaw -- opening much too narrow to be useful!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this bag at all. Open, it is too narrow to store much of anything. The frame is sturdy, and the hanging bags with multiple pockets are handy. However, the design is flawed because the open dimension of 4.5" is too narrow to store much in, much less see into once yarn and projects are placed into it. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Sozzie

customer_reviews.title: Great little caddy
customer_reviews.text: Great little caddy! It stores all my hooks, needles, and other tools well with extra space for more. I can also fit 2 or 3 medium-ish sized projects easily. It's alot deeper than I thought it was going to be, so the fact that it isn't very wide doesn't bother me. I have two cats so I use the zipper pouch as a lid to keep them out of the caddy, instead of hanging it on the side, and it works like a charm! It also travels well, even with projects in it, just fold and go!
customer_reviews.author: Allena

customer_reviews.title: Great item just has minor manufacturing defect. Missing footpegs
customer_reviews.text: Missing footpegs on one side. very nice quality material. Liked the item but disappointed about the missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: scincin3

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Knitting Caddy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. It met my expectations. I stacked my yarn and needles just as the picture indicates and it sits by my couch so I can easily pick and knit or stop as needed. Super pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: and she loved it. She crochets a lot
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, no damage. I bought this as a gift for my husband's daughter, and she loved it. She crochets a lot, and this comes in very handy for her. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace one that broke it was made with a wooden frame. I like this metal frame and the pockets that are a feature my old one did not have.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love love love the pattern, holds my yarn and all my supplies! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Knitting Storage Caddy
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size of it, but wish it had some smaller pockets to store tape measure, stitch markers, small scissors, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: nice gift for those who knit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as a present, she recently started knitting. She loves it-
customer_reviews.author: pr299

customer_reviews.title: Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Grandma loved her gift, it is very durable, sturdy and a great size!
customer_reviews.author: Lila

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is the best of my 2. (I needed another for a different project). Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Te Glover

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Storage for all my needles and other gadgets. I wish it was a little wider to hold all my yarn but I just put the yarn and that I'm working with.
customer_reviews.author: Carter's

customer_reviews.title: I love the extra bags making things easy to find
customer_reviews.text: I love the extra bags making things easy to find. But my two negatives are that it doesn't open wide enough and it's heavier than the one I am use to.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Marker

customer_reviews.title: Great for all my girlfriends knitting stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps everything neat and organized. Very easy to use and arrived perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: I love this caddy
customer_reviews.text: I love this caddy. It is much nicer than I anticipated and is very spacious for all my sewing needs. Great purchase !!
customer_reviews.author: LORRAINE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, great quality and holds a lot of stuff. So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Keeps my cocker spaniel out of my ...
customer_reviews.text: So worth the money. Love it. Keeps my cocker spaniel out of my yarn!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: I love my caddie!
customer_reviews.text: The caddie is sturdy, roomy and is perfect for keeping my projects safe from my cat while working on them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Robertson

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, loads of pockets, and easy to use. Like other reviewers, I wish it opened a bit farther, but that's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: AC Too

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had seen the white yarn caddy with ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had seen the white yarn caddy with the shoulder strap before I purchased this one. It's well constructed, but has such a narrow opening. Too narrow. It couldn't transport an Afghan.
customer_reviews.author: James Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. It's a good size--holds everything I need for the blanket I'm working on!
customer_reviews.author: NMS523

customer_reviews.title: Was searching for a new one of these.
customer_reviews.text: The legs are metal which is nicer than my previous one which was wood. It is not as wide as I would have likes it to be, but it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: B Farley

customer_reviews.title: Compact and very useful
customer_reviews.text: It holds all of my knitting necessities very nicely as well as keeping everything very handy.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it promised and it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Elke Portilla

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Art Bin
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my bin. It keeps me organized with all of my projects that I have going on.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: This caddy is great, I love the pockets on each side which hold my crochet hooks and knitting needles, and plenty of room for a could of projects!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. It barely opens and the first time I ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. It barely opens and the first time I picked it up to move it one of the horizontal pieces on top broke off. In the garbage it went....

customer_reviews.title: I love extra pockets
customer_reviews.text: I love extra pockets. I have a lot of small Knitting supplies & thr caddy helps me keep it organized.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Absolutely perfect. If you practice the yarn arts this is a must have item.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's a little small but love it otherwise. Good to hold one project and maybe 3 or 4 skeins. The pouches it comes with are super handy for creating on the go.

customer_reviews.title: knitting bag
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. I just thought it would be a larger size. It holds most of what I wanted it for

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. I was surprised by how large it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I was surprised by how large it was!

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves in. Great size, easy to use, organizes great. Perfect next to couch in family room.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my mother in law and she loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Yarn basket
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. I wish it opened wider and held more but it'll do
customer_reviews.author: vickie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice yarn bag, sturdy will not open all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag. Wish it opened wider
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. Wish it opened wider, but I like the compartment attachments. Seems pretty sturdy. Good purchase.

customer_reviews.title: not like the old ones
customer_reviews.text: Smaller inside, not like the old ones. But, still love it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the Needle / Yarn Caddy. It's great for holding items and fits wherever I need it.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and is an excellent size to leave by chair ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and is an excellent size to leave by chair so I can reach for my projects, and it won't tip over. Great price! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Heulitt

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for holding a few projects
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly how it is represented online. Nice size for holding a few projects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Believe the Reviews
customer_reviews.text: Well, stupid me! I couldn't believe the reviews that said it didn't open very far. What attracted me to it was the steel construction and the fact that the handle was separated from the bag itself. The fabric is very sturdy, too. The knitting bag I bought 50 years ago had finally started coming apart so I decided to purchase a new one. The old one opens a good 9 inches. This new one opens 5 inches, hardly enough to hold the blanket I'm knitting, plus an extra skein. If it opened wider, I'd love it. As it is, it's going back. I think I'll look for a used one in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: VCCats

customer_reviews.title: Good value, works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could move my large project around the house and to stop my cats from 'helping' me knit or crochet. I don't use the knitting needle pockets to hold needles, I tie it across the top so the cats can't see the yarn inside the caddy. It works perfectly and I haven't had any 'help' since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Great knitting bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. I really like the needle holder and the other interior bag to hold small needles and other supplies. My only "not happy" thing is it doesn't open very wide, but that is something I can adjust to.
customer_reviews.author: rb

customer_reviews.title: Bought it as a gift for my wife.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as gift for my wife because she was having difficulty keeping her projects together using standard totes. When she received it, she absolutely loved it! Keeps her yarn, hooks, scissors and everything she uses all in one place. Plus it's easy for her to tote around like sitting outside when weather is nice. Seems good quality and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Don

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Design!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Just what I was looking for to keep all my crocheting hooks and yarn neat and available! The hook bag and the zipper bag work wonderfully to hold hooks readily available to grab, and the zipper pouch holds my stitch markers, tape measure, etc without losing them. The cute gray/black diamond design on the fabric is very quaint - reminds me of my mother/grandmother's yarn basket who did needlework! The X design allows me to see my yard, patterns and is wide enough to hold many skeins or balls of yarn. Love it!!! Fits nice next to your chair or desk and is attractive to see....
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: I like to knit while watching tv at night
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep at the end of the couch. I like to knit while watching tv at night. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Super L

customer_reviews.title: convenient for working craft projects
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I keep my craft projects in plastic tubs to keep them organized but this caddy is awesome so a project is right at hand and easy to get to. There are 2 pouches attached, 1 has short zippered compartments that can hold scissors, stitch counters, etc and the other pouch has long vertical compartments that can hold knitting needles and crochet hooks. So handy!!
customer_reviews.author: Francie OP

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as the picture, is easy to carry around, holds many skeins at once and the outside pockets very helpful for the hoooks/needles, etc. I only gave it four stars because I found out that I could have gotten it cheaper at other retailers using the weekly coupon they offer. This caddy would have been half the price using that 40% discount.
customer_reviews.author: Dianamstr

customer_reviews.title: so handy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is super sturdy. I keep conveniently by my chair and its easy to spot the colors I want from the large bin. The needle and notions holders on the sides are also convenient and easy to reach and grab.
customer_reviews.author: Julie in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Crafters best friend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my BFF during Christmas time. She absolutely loved it and said she can fit a lot of yarn in it. And she loves that the pockets detach and roll up for storage!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter has become a crocheter and needed something to store her current projects and the yarn to pull out readily as she worked it. This was the answer and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cardullo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This basket is great for holding my knitting supplies and easy to grab and take with me. The quality is good. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Peg1354

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift! My stepmom loved it..lots of room and folds up nicely (even though this is now always sitting next to her chair..she Always has it out)
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Love this caddy
customer_reviews.text: Love this caddy! I bought it in gray, and it fits nicely into my room decor. I have it next to my favorite chair. It holds patterns and my current projects. The two attached roll ups store extra needles and accessories. I get many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Atka's Mom

customer_reviews.title: plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice caddy to use at home. it has plenty of room to hold yarn and project. Since I have dogs that love to chew on things I do not use the needle holder. I was surprised at the large size.
customer_reviews.author: Rena Fulk

customer_reviews.title: Great project caddy
customer_reviews.text: Buy this! It is soooo nice! It is really sturdy and the fabric is really nice and durable. The removable pockets are nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use it, but.....
customer_reviews.text: This has some good features, but in general....it's clumsy and heavy. I would prefer it was made out of wood. The pipes stick out pretty far past the ends. They wouldn't have to. The pockets are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for!! Large inside section and a large side pocket inside. Also, 2 great outside pockets! I do wish they offered other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: strong and big
customer_reviews.text: Liked the gray because it doesnt 'stand out ' in a room where you do your handiwork. You know, not making the room look cluttered. Tough metal frame , kind of heavy for carrying around but great for stationary basket by favorite chair. Has large capasity for working afghans.
customer_reviews.author: marie terrell

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I had one like this that was destroyed with my house by hurricane Maria. I took a chance ordering one that was a little different (shorter) and I like it just fine
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L. Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Very nice project bin
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my knitting and crochet projects, and love it. Should have bought one sooner! I am able to stash all my hooks, needles and notions in the various pouches & pockets, and everything is very accessible. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri O.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this!!! It’s great to keep all your supplies nice and organized, well put together and super cute, looks great in my living room beside my recliner. So convenient to have a mini knitting station right there beside me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for knitters or crochet yarns.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me. I lost my original in ma last move, and was really happy to find this one at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: LadyM

customer_reviews.title: Works great and holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: I love this caddy. I have two. One was a replacement for the first one cause the first one the side compartment the attachment was broken. Amazon sent me a free replacement and i'm happy with that decision.
customer_reviews.author: Amy A.

product_meta.title: ArtBin 6932AG Needle Arts Caddy Knitting & Crochet Organizer, Collapsible Poly Canvas Caddy, Gray Print
product_meta.description: Color:Gray PrintThe ArtBin Needle Arts Caddy is made from black coated metal tubing and durable poly canvas. Needle roll and zippered accessory pouches easily snap on crossbar of the caddy for easy access and added storage. Accessory pouches can be closed for safe transportation. Caddy measures 20"x18"x2" and comes with a needle roll (which holds both knitting needles and crochet hooks) and a zippered pouch (with 3 roomy pockets) that can be snapped onto the frame while in use. Accessory pouches can be detached and stored inside the caddy for safe transportation.
feature_bullets: Accessories Included: The ArtBin Needle Arts Caddy comes with a needle roll (which holds both knitting needles and crochet hooks) and a zippered pouch (with 3 roomy pockets) that can be snapped onto the frame while in use. Needle roll and zippered accessory pouches easily snap on crossbar of the caddy for easy access and added storage. The accessory pouches can be detached and stored inside the caddy for safe transportation.

Knitting and Crochet Organizer: The ArtBin Needle Arts Caddy stores and organizes all of your supplies in one spot - no more searching for needles, no more hunting for the next ball of yarn. Place this convenient storage unit next to your favorite chair so that your supplies and projects are always handy.
Durable Materials: The ArtBin Needle Arts Caddy is made from black coated metal tubing and durable polycanvas.
Foldable Design: The ArtBin Needle Arts Caddy features a folding frame design that travels well, even with projects in it - just fold and go! Perfect for the crafter on the go.

Product Details: The ArtBin Yarn Tote measures 20 x 18 x 2 inches. Comes in a gray fashion print poly-canvas fabric. Includes (1) needle roll and (1) zippered pouch that can be snapped onto the metal frame.
